query:
UPDATE gpu_prover_queue
                SET
                    instance_status = 'available',
                    updated_at = NOW(),
                    queue_free_slots = $3
                WHERE
                    instance_host = $1::TEXT::inet
                    AND instance_port = $2
                    AND instance_status = 'full'
                    AND region = $4
                    AND zone = $5
